scripts.as:build:untouched: npx asc assembly/index.ts -b build/untouched.wasm -t build/untouched.wat --use Math=JSMath --importMemory --sourceMap --validate --measure
scripts.as:build:optimized: npx asc assembly/index.ts -b build/optimized.wasm -t build/optimized.wat -d build/optimized.d.ts --use Math=JSMath -O3 --importMemory --sourceMap --validate --noDebug --measure
scripts.as:build: npm run as:build:untouched && npm run as:build:optimized
scripts.js:build: npx rollup -c rollup.config.js --input index.js --file build/game-of-life.js --environment NAME:gameOfLife
